name: Volcano Valley
description:
Made for #TrainJam2019

Have the most ground painted at the end of 90 seconds to win! Use fun items and watch out for volcanoes!

Controls -----------------------------------------------------------------------

  • Controller:
    • Right Trigger - Accelerate
    • Left Trigger - Brake
    • Left Stick - Steer
    • Face Buttons - Ping (helps you locate which car you are)
  • Keyboard:
    • Player 1:
      • W - Accelerate
      • S - Brake
      • A/D - Steer
    • Player 2:
      • Y - Accelerate
      • H - Brake
      • G/J - Steer
    • Player 3:
      • P - Accelerate
      • : - Brake
      • L/' - Steer
    • Player 4:
      • ⬆️ - Accelerate
      • ⬇️ - Brake
      • ⬅️/➡️ - Steer
